ProjectTitle: Linking genetic alteration to brain development and behavior in a mouse model for Autism Spectrum Disorder
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/02/2023
Please note that storing data on external hard drives only is not very secure, and that onedrive is an external cloud service and data here are not stored on the KU Leuven servers. Please have a look at the storage guide for more information and to select the most suitable storage solution for your work: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Please note that KU Leuven now also has a data repository RDR that you can use for data sharing: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
